name: pechkin
description: Node.js package for asynchronously handling fields & files from `multipart/form-data` requests

scripts.ts:all: npm run ts:cjs && npm run ts:es && npm run ts:typedefs
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run ts:all
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test && npm run build

author: Rafael Sofi-zada <rafa.sofizadeh@gmail.com>
